title: Parked in PDX
content: Mom got her nine packages today, sent UPS ground in some other blog post.Ulmer and I (likely to be confused by some misspellers) shot the breeze on Google Talk this afternoon (he's in a desert bizmo, I'm somewhere in the Hawthorne matrix -- lots of wireless coffee shops).Yes, other Wanderers besides Dave and I use IM clients, blogs and so on.  This might help us recruit among a broader demographic, as young folk today seem born with IM skills and can't fathom why adults wouldn't have 'em.
author: Kirby Urner
